1.title: Healing
1.plot: On today's show, the amazing story of two women who encountered God's healing power, an interview with actor Stelio Savante, plus music, testimonies and the word of God to help you stand firm in adversity.

2.title: Revival
2.plot: On today's show, the story of a drug-addict turned pastor, an interview with Dallas television star Sheree J. Wilson, a miracle cancer healing, plus music and a message to help you live a full life.

3.title: Worship
3.plot: On today's show, the amazing God-encounter that transformed a doughnut maker to a recording artist, an interview with actress Renee Lawless, music, powerful testimonies and a message connecting you to a religion that works.

4.title: Marriage and Relationships
4.plot: On today's show, a painful abortion and the miracles that restored hope, an interview with Band of Brothers actor Richard Speight, Jr., life-limiting asthma instantly healed, music, plus God's word for winning in life.

5.title: Miracles
5.plot: On today's show, two stories of infertility with miraculous happy endings, behind the scenes of Supernatural with actor Richard Speight, Jr., plus explosive worship music and the word of God to activate your healing miracle.

6.title: New Beginnings
6.plot: On today's show, a young alcoholic gets a new beginning, an interview with actress Gloria Garayua of Gray's Anatomy, and a miracle healing from depression, plus music and divine help from the word of God.

imdb.plot outline: Help is on the way. The Steve and Kathy show is an uplifting mix of real-life inspirational stories, celebrity interviews, contemporary worship music, powerful God-encounters and a stirring message from God's word hosted by Steve and Kathy Gray, the senior and founding pastors of World Revival Church.
imdb.title: Steve & Kathy
plot: The "Steve and Kathy" show is an uplifting mix of real-life inspirational stories, celebrity interviews, contemporary worship music, powerful God-encounters and a stirring message from God's word hosted by Steve and Kathy Gray.::Laura Woodworth

Help is on the way. The Steve and Kathy show is an uplifting mix of real-life inspirational stories, celebrity interviews, contemporary worship music, powerful God-encounters and a stirring message from God's word hosted by Steve and Kathy Gray, the senior and founding pastors of World Revival Church.::Laura Woodworth

Hosted by Steve and Kathy Gray, the Steve and Kathy show is an uplifting mix of inspirational stories, celebrity interviews, contemporary worship music and stirring messages from God's word with a fresh look at Israel and God's plan for the Jews. Steve and Kathy have helped thousands experience the reviving power of God - and you can too. Get ready to embrace life like never before because help is on the way.::LWoodworth
